thread.title: Federal judge to hold status hearing on North Carolina’s voter ID challenge
thread.title_full: Federal judge to hold status hearing on North Carolina’s voter ID challenge - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Federal judge to hold status hearing on North Carolina’s voter ID challenge
text: Attorneys will update a federal judge Friday about their latest arguments over North Carolina ’s voter ID provision that is set to go into effect in 2016. Lawyers representing state lawmakers contend the legal challenge should be dismissed.
